label: Actor Tag
description: Specifies the actor of an Address

label: Event Tag
description: Specifies an event that occurred on the Address or with involvement of the address

label: Attribute Tag
description: Specifies an attribute or property or behavior of the Address e.g. if the user of a certain service is a miner or contract deployer or similar

label: Mention Tag
description: Tag was mentioned in some interesting context e.g. on a darkweb forum or market
